pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mercurial Keyring is a Mercurial extension used to securely save HTTP and SMTP authentication passwords in password databases (Gnome Keyring, KDE KWallet, OSXKeyChain, Windows Vault etc). With mercurial_keyring active, Mercurial remembers your passwords and reuses them without prompting (as if you stored them in .hgrc), but password storage is reasonably secure. Actual password storage is implemented by the keyring library, this extension glues it to Mercurial.
